title.rendered: Women in Motion Film Festival Accra

content.rendered: This Women’s History Month, we are teaming up with Alliance Française d’Accra and Goethe-Institut Ghana to bring you eight nights of films for, about, and by women. Join us – all screenings are free.

excerpt.rendered: This Women’s History Month, we are teaming up with Alliance Française d’Accra and Goethe-Institut Ghana to bring you eight nights of films for, about, and by women. Join us – all screenings are free.
